meanings.sent1: The hilliest region in our state is perfect for hiking.
meanings.sent2: This area is known for being one of the hilliest in the country.
meanings.sent3: The hilliest part of the park always makes me catch my breath.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rolling and hilliest as the landscape before us.
meanings.sent5: The hilliest terrain challenged even the most experienced climbers.

meanings.sent1: It was the hilliest road we had ever driven on.
meanings.sent2: The hilliest path led us to the most breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: The hilliest roller coaster in the amusement park was a thrilling ride.
meanings.sent4: His hilliest joke had everyone laughing for hours.
meanings.sent5: The hilliest mountain stood tall against the clear blue sky.
